article:
My name is Mike. I'm _ America. I'm in a school in Shanghai. Here is a  _ of my class.
You can see my _ in the photo. Jimmy likes to play soccer very much. Helen likes math. Her favourite _ is hamburgers. Sandra doesn't like math. But she can speak Chinese. She likes _ and she sings very well. We all like to _ to her songs. Sally is a black girl. She is from Africa. She likes to eat  _ . Can you _ me in the photo? The _ in a blue shirt is me. I like to eat bananas, too. Bob likes computers very much. He plays computer games very well. Nick likes sports. And he often plays _ with Jimmy. He likes strawberries best.
